description: Abort a file transfer in progress
Close connection to the server unilaterally

arguments: host: str,port: int = 21,user: str = None,password: str = None,tls: bool = False,transfer: str = passive
description: Connect to FTP server :param host: address of the server :param port: port of the server, defaults to 21 :param user: login name, defaults to None :param password: login password, defaults to None :param tls: connect using TLS support, defaults to False :param transfer: mode of the transfer, defaults to "passive" :raises AuthenticationException: on authentication error with the server
Change working directory on the server :param dirname: name of the directory
Delete file on the server :param filepath: path to server file
Download file from FTP server :param remotefile: path to remote file on the server :param localfile: name of the downloaded file on the local filesystem, if None will have same name as remote file
Return byte size of the file on the server :param filepath: path to server file
Get server welcome message :return: welcome message
List files on the server directory :param dirname: name of the directory
Create a new directory on the server :param dirname: name of the directory
Get current working directory on the server
Send QUIT command to the server and close connection
Rename file on the server :param fromname: current name of the file :param toname: new name for the file
Remove directory on the server :param dirname: name of the directory
Execute command on the server List of FTP commands https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_FTP_commands :param command: name of the command to send
Set debug level for the library 0 - no debugging output 1 - moderate amount of debugging 2+ - higher amount of debugging :param level: integer value of debug level, defaults to 0
Upload file to FTP server :param localfile: path to file to upload :param remotefile: name of uploaded file in the server
